name: Exorcism The Game
description:
EXORCISM

Welcome to the year 1981. Ghost investigations. Parnormal entities and believing in the power of God. You are a young priest with little to no experience. Your goal is to heal a house that is being possessed by 3 demons, that are thirsty for blood.

Save the house, and become a famous priest!!

__________-----__________

Instructions to play are in the game.

__________-----__________

Game is made for a school project at my school. My classmates did some games too. All by themselves!!! All of the games are so cool. 

Special thanks to my teachers, they played a big part in all of our games. And because of them we started to make awesome games. In the future we hope to be big developers. Wish us luck <3
